text: haey nowpel khnhom robsa yeung suor anak( mou ham meat)ampi yeung ( chaur anak chhlaey tha) pitabrakd nasa yeung now chit bamphot(doeng lyy kheunh ...) . yeung ttuol yk kar buongsuong som robsa anak del ttouch som nowpel delke ban buongsuong som pi yeung . dauchnaoh haey chaur aoy puokke korp brate b tde tam banhchea robsa yeung haey chaur aoy puokke mean chomnue leu yeung . sangkhumtha puokke nung ttuol ban kar changaoulobangheanh
